content: skill level beginner level 1 chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* *300 yards will make both items in the set * *200 yards will make either hat or scarf * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge 3 single_crochet = 2 3 single_crochet row = 2 or 1 half_double_crochet row = 1 hat is worked in rounds from the top down *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ribbed-scarf--brimmed-hat-scarf
